name: PowerStep Pulse Maxx Running Insoles
description: Maximum cushioning and support insoles designed specifically for running, offering relief from plantar fasciitis and other foot pain while providing stability and shock absorption.
longDescription:
PowerStep Pulse Maxx Running Insoles combine maximum cushioning with targeted support to enhance your running experience while alleviating foot pain. These specialized insoles feature a deep heel cradle for stability, a firm but flexible arch support, and a cushioned forefoot with anti-shock technology.

Designed specifically for running and high-impact activities, the PowerStep Pulse Maxx insoles provide superior biomechanical support to prevent overpronation while the dual-layer cushioning absorbs impact with every stride. The antimicrobial top fabric reduces friction and heat, helping to prevent blisters and maintain a fresh environment.

These premium insoles are ideal for runners experiencing plantar fasciitis, heel pain, arch discomfort, or general foot fatigue. The orthotic design supports the foot's natural alignment, potentially improving overall performance while reducing pain from heel to toe. PowerStep insoles are trusted by podiatrists and athletes alike for their clinical design and durable construction.

features.title: Maximum Cushioning
features.description: Dual-layer cushioning system with VCT (Variable Cushioning Technology) provides superior shock absorption for high-impact activities

features.title: Enhanced Arch Support
features.description: Firm, flexible support shell with reinforced arch design for improved stability and motion control during running

features.title: Anti-Fatigue Technology
features.description: Specialized forefoot cushioning reduces fatigue during long runs and helps prevent ball-of-foot pain

features.title: Deep Heel Cradle
features.description: Extra-deep heel cup provides maximum stability and helps align the foot to reduce stress on joints

features.title: Antimicrobial Fabric
features.description: Heat and friction-reducing top fabric with antimicrobial treatment to prevent odor and blisters

pros: Specifically designed for running and high-impact activities
Maximum cushioning reduces impact stress on feet, knees, and back
Effective relief for plantar fasciitis and heel pain
Helps correct overpronation to improve running form
Durable construction stands up to frequent use
Can be transferred between different running shoes
No trimming required - ready to use out of the box
cons: Thicker profile may feel snug in shoes that already have limited space
Higher price point compared to basic insoles
May require a brief break-in period for some users
Firmer support might feel too rigid for runners who prefer softer cushioning
Not ideal for minimalist or zero-drop running shoes
